sentence: In the states Senate race, the leading Republican candidate, the Trump-backed former football star Herschel Walker, said on Wednesday that he wasnt sure if Mr. Biden had been lawfully elected in 2020. I dont know,? Mr. Walker told a New York Times reporter after a speech in Macon, Ga. I do think there was problems.
title: Midterm Stakes Grow Clearer: Election Deniers Will Be on Many Ballots

sentence: Ive dedicated my entire career to working in the interests of marginalized Black communities.? Herschel Walker, the former football star leading the race for the Republican nomination for a Georgia Senate seat, said that a ban on abortion should have no exceptions presumably even for rape, incest or the health of the mother.
title: Midterm Stakes Grow Clearer: Election Deniers Will Be on Many Ballots

sentence: The former president has been savvy with some of his endorsements, allying himself with candidates who already have high profiles (including Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker for Senate in Pennsylvania and Georgia, respectively) or bestowing his approval at crucial times (as he did at the last minute for Mr. Mastriano, who was already leading).
author: Kimberley A. Strassel
title: The Limits of Stop the Steal

sentence: As noted a month ago, the GOP Senate primary in Georgia features Herschel Walker against state agriculture commissioner Gary Black, former state representative Josh Clark, U.S. Air Force captain and entrepreneur Kelvin King, and former U.S. Navy SEAL and director of Intelligence Programs on the National Security Council Latham Saddler.
author: Jim Geraghty
title: Trump's Gambling Isn't Paying Off

sentence: BRUNI: Thoughts on Herschel Walker (potentially) in the Senate, in five words or less.
title: The G.O.P. Has Gone Even Farther to the Right Than I Expected': Three Writers Talk About the Midterms
